channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- vRealize Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- vRealize Automation

item.title: CVE-2018-6958|2024-08-05T06:17:17.209Z -- vmware -- vrealize%20automation
item.description: VMware vRealize Automation (vRA) prior to 7.3.1 contains a vulnerability that may allow for a DOM-based cross-site scripting (XSS) attack. Exploitation of this issue may lead to the compromise of the vRA user's workstation.

item.title: CVE-2018-6959|2024-08-05T06:17:17.270Z -- vmware -- vrealize%20automation
item.description: VMware vRealize Automation (vRA) prior to 7.4.0 contains a vulnerability in the handling of session IDs. Exploitation of this issue may lead to the hijacking of a valid vRA user's session.
